q: why does the man wear life jackets during drifting
pred: The man is wearing life jackets while drifting on the river to ensure his safety in case of an accident or if he falls into the water. Life jackets are essential for water sports like drifting, as they provide buoyancy and help the person stay afloat in the water. This is especially important for beginners or those who are not strong swimmers, as it reduces the risk of drowning and allows them to stay in the water for a longer period of time.
